alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:43AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, Juneau, Adams and Monroe Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 542 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Babcock to 6 miles northwest of New Lisbon. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Necedah around 550 AM CDT. Dellwood around 600 AM CDT. Friendship, Adams and New Rome around 605 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Miner, Highways 13 And 21, County Roads G And O, County Roads G And M, Highway 13 And County E, County Roads C And G, Shennington, The Rezin Landing Strip, Buckhorn State Park and Grand Marsh. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 48 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
